EmailTemplate.name: Missed Delivery- Escalated
EmailTemplate.subject: Philadelphia Inquirer - Missed Delivery-Escalated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello, {!Contact.FirstName}:
We sincerely apologize for the missed deliveries you experienced. A credit has been applied to your account for the missed delivery, and an escalated complaint has been sent to the Regional Manager in order to ensure this is resolved for you going forward. Again, we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.
Don't forget you may report a missed delivery, schedule a vacation, and access the Digital Replica Editions by going to the Subscriber Service Website: https://myaccount.philly.com
